DataElement.preferredName: Patient Reported Outcome Oral Symptoms Rinse Additional Dose Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field for information on the Patient Completed Oral Symptoms assessment regarding an additional dose, collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptoms, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Reported Outcome Oral Symptoms Rinse Additional Dose Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information on the Patient Completed Oral Symptoms assessment regarding an additional dose, collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptoms, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Information collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptons, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

Property.preferredName: Oral Symptom Rinse Dosage Form Additional Dose Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: Of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.:Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.:A liquid used to cleanse by flushing.:Added; extra; further.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.
Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.
A solution or suspension intended for irrigation purposes.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
